metadata.title: CVE-2021-33477 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: rxvt-unicode 9.22, rxvt 2.7.10, mrxvt 0.5.4, and Eterm 0.9.7 allow(potentially remote) code execution because of improper handling of certainescape sequences (ESC G Q). A response is terminated by a newline.

criterions.comment: rxvt-unicode: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
rxvt-unicode: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
eterm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
